website_summaries.verdict: A powerful lawn mower battery with a number of features that make it a top choice.
pros: This model is designed to be efficient in a wide range of temperatures
It offers an impressive 320 CCA, which should be sufficient for your toughest starting needs
The model comes with a 1-year limited warranty for peace of mind
cons: Careless shipping can damage this battery, so check for leaks when it arrives

customer_reviews.title: Works good so far
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in a rush. Battery has been holding a good charge for a few weeks now. No starting issues so far. No battery acid pouring and measuring which is nice. I did put it on my small charger before installing and starting my x320 John Deere mower.
customer_reviews.author: darrick

customer_reviews.title: Use the 2 new bolts that come with the new battery.
customer_reviews.text: My original battery dies after 2 seasons, so I referenced the replacement called out in the manual. The dimensions on the replacement battery were larger than the original and therefore would require modification in order for it to fit. I researched and found that the might max model for Craftsman was identical for the battery used for the Club Cadet as you can see from the picture, no modifications were necessary. Hope this helps..
customer_reviews.author: nickyboy-1

customer_reviews.title: Check charge before installation
customer_reviews.text: Came with a low charge ,seems to have recuperated will test longevity over winter
customer_reviews.author: Profwizbang

customer_reviews.title: Battery terminals opposite photo, larger than U1 size
customer_reviews.text: The photo shows the positive on left—now have noted “description” say right—IMAGE WRONG. Opposite my SCAG mower‘s terminals. The size is slightly larger than a standard U1-7–it will not fit the closed carrier on my mower by less than a millimeter. It might work if I can get it to fit. When it arrived the box was heavily damaged and had a wet spot—but I see no cracks In the case. I regret buying this online—
customer_reviews.author: Voss

customer_reviews.title: battery
customer_reviews.text: Battery arrived promptly, started mower with no problems. Not easy to install, not battery fault, mower fault. cannot rate longevity just go it.
customer_reviews.author: Old Jake

customer_reviews.title: Excellent seller to work with!!!
customer_reviews.text: The first battery we received was leaking however acid never made it past the excellent barriers in shipping containment. Contacted the seller and they were awesome in taking care of the situation, had a replacement battery within a few days. Thus far if could would give more stars(Exception longevity - placed stars in the middle, as uncertain about life of, benefit of a doubt being a battery after all.). Just appreciate a good product and good backing, -C&L-
customer_reviews.author: Lori Prantil

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Quickly And Charged
customer_reviews.text: Battery had a full charge upon arrival and was as described. If it lasts several years will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Video Buster

customer_reviews.title: Great lawn mower battery. Sealed and will avoid gunked up battery cables.
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Appears to be well made. Good cranking power on 19hp mower.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck80751

customer_reviews.title: Received wet
customer_reviews.text: Battery box was wet when received. Cleaned up battery and it’s only half charged, currently charging battery. Unable to rate until determine if battery will charge.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Smith

customer_reviews.title: Completly satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Battery fit fine, fired right up and holds a charge well. Would be the battery I will buy if another is needed for another piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mighty Max came through!
customer_reviews.text: USPS screwed up and Mighty Max came through! Problem solved! Thanks guys!
customer_reviews.author: Ron Barone

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: This was not as described and cannot return / for shame
customer_reviews.author: LuckyGoddess

customer_reviews.title: Product description
customer_reviews.text: Fixed my problem on the repair job that I did for a family member.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Battery performs well.
customer_reviews.text: Product delivered as advertised. No problem starting my cub cadet zero turn 17hp mower.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Mighty Max Battery ML-U1-CCAHR 12V 320CCA Battery for Craftsman 25780 Lawn Tractor Mower Brand Product
product_meta.description:
This ML-U1-CCA-HR 12 volts 320 CCA absorbed glass mat (AGM) battery is made with the highest quality pure virgin lead (99.99%) to create a long lasting, durable power source for any machinery requiring a cold cranking power source.
The advanced pure lead technology, lower internal resistance and increased plate compression give this battery a longer service life, better deep cycling and overall quicker start-ups for all your lawn and garden machinery. The clever, non-spillable design allows the battery to sit and function in virtually any position increasing your opportunity for ease of mounting. The tough AGM separators and high cell composition increase this batteryâ€s vibration resistance up to 20 times more than that of conventional batteries making it perfect for all your lawn and garden machinery.
Specifications of the ML-U1-CCA-HR Battery

Voltage: 12 Volt
CCA: 320
Chemistry: SLA, AGM
Terminal: Nut & Bolt

Battery Dimensions:7.75 in x 5.11 in x 6.25 in
Weight: 14.00 Lbs

Warranty:
1 Year
Genuine Mighty Max battery Product
feature_bullets: ML-U1 is a 12V 320 Cold Cranking Amps (CCA) Sealed Lead Acid (SLA) Battery.
Dimensions: 7.75 inches x 5.11 inches x 6.25 inches. Polarity: Positive on Right, Negative on Left. Listing is for the Battery and Screws only. No wire harness or mounting accessories included.
SLA / AGM spill proof battery has a characteristic of high discharge rate, wide operating temperatures, long service life and deep discharge recover.
Rechargeable battery that can be mounted in any position, resists shocks and vibration. Long lasting high performance in high and low temperatures.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars77 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
